attributes.action: Clear British criminal records after 10 yrs of no reoffending
attributes.additional_details: Rehabilitation is ment to be getting bk into society to live a normal life..but how can you with a record over ya head that no one will allow you to forget..your ment to forget that life in the past not relive it
attributes.background: Criminal records need to be cleared of the computer data base but kept on paper..in order to allow true 100% rehabilitation.. in order for ex offender's to live a gd healthy life to be able to get a decent paid job..and not live on benefits
